title: HPI 42 - In Good Taste - The Aesthetics of Rasa
itunes:title: HPI 42 - In Good Taste - The Aesthetics of Rasa
description: Bharata’s Nāṭya-Śāstra and later works from Kashmir explore the idea of rasa, an emotional response to drama, music, and poetry.
